item.title: New YA Book Releases for October 1, 2025
item.description: From remixed fairytales to life-altering roadtrips and a fresh riff on Frankenstein, don't miss out on this week's new YA book releases.

item.title: A Delightfully Strange Take on The End-of-the-World Novel
item.description: If you love character-driven science fiction, this quirky book is a must-read novel of 2025.

item.title: October’s New Historical Fiction For Fall
item.description: New fall historical fiction filled with haunted houses, gothic thrillers, and ghosts of the Titanic.

item.title: Six Spooky New Genre-Bending Books
item.description: Space PTSD, monstrous entities in small town caves, and mysterious staircases in the woods all terrify in these genre-benders.

item.title: October’s New Mystery, Thrillers, & True Crime Books (Some Horror Vibes Included)
item.description: There’s also an Edwardian era Gothic mansion, a family of spies in a secret world organization, true crime with a wrongly convicted, and more
